onboard1.onboard_title: Start selling after a day or two with 5 steps & Enjoy your first 50 orders won't be charged for the transaction fee

onboard_item_form_data.title: Add product
onboard_item_form_data.progress_bar_desc: Build your product catalog and add what you want to sell.

content.title: Add your first product
content.desc: Adding products have never been easier with these 2 ways: Manually create product listings or Import AliExpress products with URL
content.secondary_button: Or import AliExpress products with URLs

content_after_done.title: You've added your first product
content_after_done.desc: Add more products or go on to another step

onboard_item_form_data.title: Activate payment provider
onboard_item_form_data.progress_bar_desc: Set up a payment provider so your customers can check out and you can get paid.

content.title: Choose the way your customers pay for their purchases
content.desc: Set up one or more payment providers (PayPal, Stripe, Cardpay or Checkout.com ) in your store to let customers pay using credit cards or PayPal

content_after_done.title: You've enable payments
content_after_done.desc: Set up another payment provider or go on to another step

onboard_item_form_data.title: Add custom domain
onboard_item_form_data.progress_bar_desc: Your current domain is . Add or buy a custom domain to help customers remember your online store.

content.title: Add custom domain to increase brand trust for your store
content.desc: Your domain reflects how trustworthy your store is. Plus, your buyers are able to check out their orders only after your custom domain is added & active
content.secondary_button: Learn how to add a custom domain

content_after_done.title: Your domain has been connected
content_after_done.desc: Add or buy another domain, or go on to another step

onboard_item_form_data.title: Install tracking
onboard_item_form_data.progress_bar_desc: Track and optimize all your Facebook or Google Ads campaigns.

content.title: Set up essential tracking codes to track your marketing results
content.desc: Track your store visitors' behaviours & run your advertising effectively with these data collected.

content_after_done.title: You've added necessary tracking codes
content_after_done.desc: Add more tracking tools if needed or go on to another step

onboard2.onboard_title: 2 easy steps to get your store well-prepared for the customer visits

onboard_item_form_data.title: Customize theme
onboard_item_form_data.progress_bar_desc: Choose a theme and add a logo, product slideshow, and colors that match your brand.

content.title: Tailor the look of your store without coding skills needed
content.desc: From your chosen store template, let's edit your store's logo, colors, and other basic elements to create an impressive look that resonates with the brand image you want to build

content_after_done.title: You've made some changes to your theme
content_after_done.desc: Update more to sharpen the look of your store, or go on to another step

onboard_item_form_data.title: Config Boost Upsell
onboard_item_form_data.progress_bar_desc: Pitch additional products to get your customers to buy more or acquire more enhanced products.

content.title: Increase your revenue easily & effectively
content.desc: Pitch additional products to get your customers to buy more or acquire more enhanced products

content_after_done.title: You've have successfully config upsell
content_after_done.desc: Update more boost upsell options, or discover Boost Convert to increase CR

onboard_item_form_data.title: Register Merchant Center
onboard_item_form_data.progress_bar_desc: Get ready to sell on Google Shopping.

content.title: No worries when selling on Google Shopping
content.desc: Easily set up your Google Merchant Center account with the help of ShopBase!

content_after_done.title: Congratulation! You've connected Google Merchant Center
content_after_done.desc: Follow Google's guidelines and manage your products directly in Merchant Center.
content_after_done.secondary_button: Sync your products to Merchant Center

content.title: Boost sales via multiple channels
content.desc: Discover new sale channels to get more customers and generate more revenue.

content_after_done.title: You've have successfully connect sales channels
content_after_done.desc: Connect more sales channels option to increase traffic and sales.

onboard_item_form_data.title: Connect email services
onboard_item_form_data.progress_bar_desc: Increase customer retention & sales by using email marketing services for your store

content.title: Connect email services
content.desc: Increase customer retention & sales by using email marketing services for your store.

content_after_done.title: You've have successfully connect email services
content_after_done.desc: Config abandoned cart email content to win back customers.
content_after_done.secondary_button: Explore more abandoned card email templates
